column5: went to a sweet lake to get me some whities .........   ended up catching some AWESOME LING.  the biggest iv ever seen on soft water......    heres is steph BEAST!  she absolutly hates them!    here is my good ol' pal mike with his first loche EVER!    and here is me with an ugly BARBO!    ugly fish but nice fights!
How did this one slip down so quickly????  Man that's some big lings you guys got into    Congrats Kev and co  Did you keep any for the pan??  Some say it's very good eats Jacques
Very nice!!! I would have bonked the bunch!!!! They are indeed super tasty!!!
Very cool!!!! Do you guys fish for them after dark with dead bait? That is one species I have never fished for. Is there good seasonal patterns for the,?   Darren
Those are some hefty lings/burbot. You got alot of decent fish in your reports. Thanks
Now I know what he was whining about. Must have been the day someone new replied to every fisheries news thread in 15 minutes.  Some bigg'uns there fella. Steph's a trooper for sure!!!
Some serious looking LING right there..
I hear they taste good.  But i cant get past the look of them.  I aint going to eat one.  Good size fish WTG.
